summary: An army lieutenant accused of robbery pursues the real thief on a frantic chase through Mexico aided by the thief's fiancee.
cast: Robert Mitchum|Jane Greer|William Bendix|Patric Knowles|Ramon Novarro|Don Alvarado|John Qualen|Pascual García Peña|Gregorio Acosta|Salvador Baguez|Henry Carr|Edward Colebrook|Bing Conley|Don Dillaway|Alphonso DuBois|Juan Duval|Virginia Farmer|Nacho Galindo|Elias Gamboa|Raúl Guerrero|Frank Hagney|Rodolfo Hoyos Jr.|Ted Jacques|Frank Leyva|José Loza|Margarito Luna|Primo López|Dorothy Mitchum|Carmen Morales|Lillian O'Malley|Pat O'Malley|Beatriz Ramos|Tony Roux|Bernard Sell|Carl Sklover|Dimas Sotello|Arturo Soto Rangel|Alfredo de Soto|Alfonso Sánchez Tello|Jorge Treviño|Felipe Turich|Juan Varro
title: El gran robo
